_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The teaching visible in this very life [: When there’s greed in you, do you understand ‘I have greed in me’?
When there’s no greed in you, do you understand ‘I have no greed in me’?
When there’s hate in you, do you understand ‘I have hate in me’?
When there’s no hate in you, do you understand ‘I have no hate in me’?
When there’s delusion in you, do you understand ‘I have delusion in me’?
When there’s no delusion in you, do you understand ‘I have no delusion in me’?
When there’s corruption that leads to physical deeds in you, do you understand ‘I have corruption that leads to physical deeds in me’?
When there’s no corruption that leads to physical deeds in you, do you understand ‘I have no corruption that leads to physical deeds in me’?
When there’s corruption that leads to speech in you, do you understand ‘I have corruption that leads to speech in me’?
When there’s no corruption that leads to speech in you, do you understand ‘I have no corruption that leads to speech in me’?
When there’s corruption that leads to mental deeds in you, do you understand ‘I have corruption that leads to mental deeds in me’?
When there’s no corruption that leads to mental deeds in you, do you understand ‘I have no corruption that leads to mental deeds in me’?
